text: Microbacterium radiodurans is a Gram-positive, heterotrophic and strictly aerobic bacterium from the genus of Microbacterium which has been isolated from the Gobi desert in China. Microbacterium radiodurans is resistant against UV radiation. == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Microbacterium radiodurans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2010 Category:Micrococcineae
title: Microbacterium radiodurans
